clustertools.custom package¶

Submodules¶

clustertools.custom.custom_functions module¶

clustertools.custom.custom_functions.cenmas_lim(m, x, v, r_lim)¶
clustertools.custom.custom_functions.def_dc(m, x, v=None, r_min=0.0045)¶

Calculates the center of density. Translated to Python from phiGRAPE.

m, x, varray_like

Particle parameters. v is optional.

r_minscalar

For star clusters, should be 0.1 pc in N-body units.

xdc, vdc : ndarrays
